column4: got a ? im trying to make it to where under my nic card i change my dns server but every time i do it like auto updates in 15 mins and changes it back? can someone tell me how to turn that off?
that is because you are using dchp
because you set it up to do it, dchp
edit /etc/dhcp3/dhclient.conf, remove domain-name-servers from the request list; then sudo /etc/init.d/networking restart
